item.name: Mantis_Claw
item.logic: DASH | WINGS | CLAW | ACID | ((FIREBALL | (SCREAM + BALDURS)) + FIREBALLSKIPS) | (SUPERDASH + BALDURS)

item.name: Crystal_Heart
item.logic: (LANTERN | QUAKE) + ((CLAW + (DASH | SUPERDASH | WINGS | ((FIREBALL | SCREAM) + FIREBALLSKIPS))) | (WINGS + (DASH | ((FIREBALL | SCREAM) + FIREBALLSKIPS)) + SPIKETUNNELS + SHADESKIPS))

item.name: Isma's_Tear
item.logic: RIGHTSIDECITY + ((SIMPLE1 + SUPERDASH + (CLAW | (ACID + WINGS))) | (TRAM + (CLAW + ((DASH + SUPERDASH) | ACID))) | (DASH + SPIKETUNNELS + (FIREBALL | SCREAM | DASHMASTER | SHARPSHADOW) + ((CLAW + SUPERDASH + ACIDSKIPS) | ((CLAW | WINGS) + ACID))))

item.name: Descending_Dark
item.logic: QUAKE + ((CLAW + (SUPERDASH | (DASH + (FIREBALL | SCREAM) + FIREBALLSKIPS))) | (WINGS + (SUPERDASH | DASH | ((FIREBALL | SCREAM) + FIREBALLSKIPS))))

item.name: Baldur_Shell
item.logic: BALDURS + (CLAW | DASH | WINGS | SUPERDASH | SHADESKIPS | (FIREBALL + FIREBALLSKIPS))

item.name: Quick_Focus
item.logic: CLAW | DASH | WINGS | SUPERDASH | ((SCREAM | FIREBALL) + FIREBALLSKIPS) | SHADESKIPS

item.name: Lifeblood_Heart
item.logic: CLAW | DASH | WINGS | SUPERDASH | ((SCREAM | FIREBALL) + FIREBALLSKIPS) | SHADESKIPS

item.name: Steady_Body
item.logic: CLAW | DASH | WINGS | SUPERDASH | ((SCREAM | FIREBALL) + FIREBALLSKIPS) | SHADESKIPS

item.name: Longnail
item.logic: CLAW | DASH | WINGS | SUPERDASH | ((SCREAM | FIREBALL) + FIREBALLSKIPS) | SHADESKIPS

item.name: Shaman_Stone
item.logic: CLAW | DASH | WINGS | SUPERDASH | ((SCREAM | FIREBALL) + FIREBALLSKIPS) | SHADESKIPS

item.name: Fragile_Heart
item.logic: CLAW | DASH | WINGS | ACID | ((FIREBALL | SCREAM) + FIREBALLSKIPS) | (SUPERDASH + BALDURS)

item.name: Fragile_Greed
item.logic: CLAW | DASH | WINGS | ACID | ((FIREBALL | SCREAM) + FIREBALLSKIPS) | (SUPERDASH + BALDURS)

item.name: Fragile_Strength
item.logic: CLAW | DASH | WINGS | ACID | ((FIREBALL | SCREAM) + FIREBALLSKIPS) | (SUPERDASH + BALDURS)

item.name: Shape_of_Unn
item.logic: (ACID + (CLAW | WINGS)) | (SUPERDASH + WINGS + FIREBALL + CLAW + DASH + MAGSKIPS)

item.name: Dashmaster
item.logic: CLAW | DASH | WINGS | ACID | ((FIREBALL | (SCREAM + BALDURS)) + FIREBALLSKIPS) | (SUPERDASH + BALDURS)

item.name: Deep_Focus
item.logic: (LANTERN | QUAKE) + ((CLAW + SUPERDASH) | (WINGS + DASH + SPIKETUNNELS) | (WINGS + SUPERDASH + SPIKETUNNELS + (FIREBALL | SCREAM)))

item.name: Crystal_Peak_Chest
item.logic: (QUAKE | LANTERN) + ((CLAW | (NOCLAW + WINGS + SPIKETUNNELS + (DASH | FIREBALL | SCREAM))) + ((Sprintmaster + Dashmaster) | DASH | SUPERDASH))

item.name: Weavers_Den_Chest
item.logic: (CLAW + DASH + (WINGS | SUPERDASH) + LANTERN) | (MISCSKIPS + ((CLAW + SUPERDASH) | ((WINGS + (SHADESKIPS | (RIGHTSIDECITY + TRAM)))) + (DASH | SUPERDASH)))

shop.name: Salubra
shop.logic: CLAW | DASH | WINGS | SUPERDASH | ((SCREAM | FIREBALL) + FIREBALLSKIPS) | SHADESKIPS

shop.name: Leg_Eater
shop.logic: CLAW | DASH | WINGS | ACID | ((FIREBALL | (SCREAM + BALDURS)) + FIREBALLSKIPS) | (SUPERDASH + BALDURS)

randomizer.macro: FIREBALL | QUAKE | Grubberfly's_Elegy | Glowing_Womb | Spore_Shroom | Weaversong | Mark_of_Pride | Cyclone_Slash | (Longnail + MAGSKIPS) | (Dash_Slash + DASH)

(QUAKE + (TRAM | LANTERN | MISCSKIPS)) | (CLAW + (SUPERDASH | WINGS)) | (SHADESKIPS + (CLAW | WINGS | (MISCSKIPS + FIREBALLSKIPS + FIREBALL + DASH))) | (CREST + ((CLAW + (DASH | WINGS)) | (SUPERDASH + (BALDURS | ACID | CLAW | WINGS | DASH)) | ACID) + ((CLAW + WINGS) | (SIMPLE1 + (CLAW | (WINGS + MISCSKIPS))))) | (TRAM + (CLAW | (WINGS + (MISCSKIPS | SHADESKIPS))))
RIGHTSIDECITY | (CREST + ((CLAW + (DASH | WINGS)) | ACID | (SUPERDASH + (BALDURS | DASH | WINGS | CLAW))))
